short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that performs history and scrolling operations at the edge of the screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At the edge of the window you can do the following

Left edge: Back to history
Right edge: Forward in history
Top edge: Scroll to the top of the window
Bottom edge: Scroll to the bottom

You can temporarily (for 5 seconds) hide the window by right-clicking on each edge.
